mapper.select: SELECT dlb.*, dlc.categoryName AS categoryName, dm.nickName AS nickName, duf.saveFileName as userProfile FROM daangn_life_board dlb JOIN daangn_member dm ON dlb.userRef = dm.idx LEFT JOIN daangn_user_file duf on dlb.userRef = duf.ref JOIN daangn_life_category dlc ON dlb.categoryRef = dlc.idx WHERE dlb.idx = #{idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO daangn_life_board (userRef, categoryRef, title, content, loc1, loc2, loc3, ip) VALUES (#{userRef}, #{categoryRef}, #{title}, #{content}, #{loc1}, #{loc2}, #{loc3}, #{ip})
mapper.update: UPDATE daangn_life_board SET categoryRef = #{categoryRef}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, loc1 = #{loc1}, loc2 = #{loc2}, loc3 = #{loc3}, updateDate = current_timestamp WHERE idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM daangn_life_board WHERE userRef = #{userRef}
